* [Issue #20 Improvement](https://github.com/UnMolDeQuimica/manim-Chemistry/pull/27): Add custom animations to GraphMolecule from bond: Rotate, Change color by [@UnMolDeQuimica](https://github.com/UnMolDeQuimica).
